question: Hey all...I just had an ultrasound done on my thyroid. I had gestational diabetes and my blood sugar remained elevated after my pregnancy so my endocrinologist sent me for an ultrasound.Impressions.. small hypervascular solid nodule in the mid portion of the right lobe of the thyroid 6 mm in maximum diameter.Should I be concerned?  I haven't been to the dr's yet, I got a copy of my test results from the radioloy group.  What is the next step?  I had melanoma in 2001, should I send a copy of the report to my Oncologist?I appreciate any input - Thanks!!!
title: please interpret for me....
